participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, Oliver has a nurturing side which comes out in his love for gardening. He's cautious but enjoys learning new things.
participant_1.background: i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and free-spirited, Sofia has a love for adventure and creativity. She's passionate about her hobbies and embraces her individuality.
participant_2.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i dance on the weekends. i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange.
